pageProduct.name: Skin Doctors White & Glow Pigmentation Eraser DuoPearl Serum 20ml
pageProduct.description:
Information

Pigmentation erasing action helps lighten & brighten complexion in 14 days for visibly glowing, radiant looking skin. Powered by the latest Microfluidics Pearl Technology, Skin Doctors White & Glow DuoPearl Serum offers an intensive dark spot and pigmentation correcting serum to help return youthful luminosity to the skin.

Our pink pigmentation and age spot correcting pink pearls are clinically proven to help combat melanin and lipofuscin, pigments responsible for the appearance of age spots and skin discoulouration.

Our whiteProbiotic Microbiome protecting pearls help balance and protect the skin from external ageing factors.

Both pearls are encapsulated and protected in a super-hydrating hyaluronic acid serum that is activated on skin for maximum impact and results.

General Information

Skin Doctors White & Glow DuoPearl Serum is a pigmentation eraser to help lighten & brighten complexion in 14 days for glowing, radiant looking skin.

Powered by the latest Microfluidics Pearl Technology, Skin Doctors White & Glow offers an intensive dark spot and pigmentation correcting serum to help return youthful luminosity to the skin.

Suspended in a nourishing hyaluronic gel are Illumiscin™ encapsulated Pearls, a concentrated clinically proven pigmentation and age spot corrector rich in Vitamin C, Zinc and Oleuropein. Skin Doctors White & Glow helps combat melanin and lipofuscin, pigments responsible for the appearance of age spots and skin discolouration. This helps erase the appearance of epidermal discolouration and spots to help them look less visible.

DuoPearls Probiotic Complex works in synergy to balance and protect the skin microbiome and is clinically proven to:
• Reduce the appearance of age spots by 12.2% in 12 weeks
• Diminish visible age spot contours by 13.5%
• Visibly reduce dark spots and pigmentation
• Dramatically brighten and lighten skin for a glowing complexion

Size: 20mL

Warnings

Always patch test 24 hours within intended area before use, if irritation occurs discontinue use. Do not use on broken or irritated skin. Avoid contact with eyes, in the event of contact with eyes, rinse immediately with plenty of water. Keep away from children.

Ingredients

Aqua, Glycerin, Alcohol, Propanediol, Butylene Glycol, Cyclopentasiloxane, Phenoxyethanol, Lactobacillus Ferment, Saccharide Isomerate, Ascorbic Acid, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Olea europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract, Zinc PCA, Sodium Hyaluronate, Polysorbate-20, Dimethicone/ Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Triethanolamine, Xanthan Gum, Caprylyl Glycol, Carbomer, Agar, Calcium Alginate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Gellan Gum, Maltodextrin, Citric Acid, Fragrance, Sodium Citrate, CI 77891, CI 77019, CI 77491.

Directions

1. Cleanse face and neck
2. Apply Skin Doctors White & Glow DuoPearl Serum over face and neck, massage in
3. Complete with Skin Doctors Supermoist™ to protect the skin
4. Use morning and night for best results

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.
